summary: This is a forwarded email from October 4, 2019, regarding scheduling an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the victim is willing to meet with agents in New York and that travel coordination is needed.

persons.name: Edwards Pottinger
persons.context: The law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC is listed in the document footer, suggesting they are involved in the correspondence regarding the victim interview.

events.title: Email Regarding Victim Interview Scheduling
events.description: An email is forwarded regarding the need to schedule an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein who is willing to meet with agents in New York.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein is willing to be interviewed by agents.
The interview needs to be scheduled while the victim is in New York.
Travel coordination for the victim is required for the interview.
The law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC is involved in the correspondence.
